mapper.select: SELECT l.loc_code AS code, l.loc_name AS name FROM ${account}.dbo.pda_locationTrace lt LEFT JOIN ${account}.dbo.pda_location l ON l.l_id = lt.Location_id WHERE rectime IN ( SELECT max(rectime) AS time FROM ${account}.dbo.pda_locationTrace lt1 WHERE lt1.p_id = #{pId} GROUP BY lt1.Location_id ) ORDER BY lt.rectime DESC
